r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
Special thanks to @stayallive for helping us debugging the memory issues in his environment! His help and guidance were of paramount importance.
### Fixed - Accessing freed memory when instrumentation code un/instrumented itself #314 - Freeing `$this` object prematurely in PHP-FPM VM #317
